title: How to Write Job Completion Summaries
description: Send a professional recap after every job to justify your price and set up the review request.

steps.title: Take completion photos
steps.description: Document the finished job before you leave.
substeps: Take 3-5 photos of the completed work
Get wide shots and detail shots
Include before/after if you took 'before' photos
Good lighting makes everything look better
steps.tip: These photos serve multiple purposes: customer summary, portfolio, review request, dispute protection.

steps.title: Use ChatGPT to write the summary
steps.description: Get a professional recap in seconds.
substeps: Type: 'Write a job completion summary for a [your trade] job. Include: what was done, any recommendations for future maintenance, and a thank you. Keep it to 3-4 short paragraphs.'
Fill in the specifics of what you actually did

steps.title: Personalize with job details
steps.description: Add the specific details of this job.
substeps: Replace generic text with actual work performed
Mention any issues you found and fixed
steps.tip: Specificity builds trust. 'Replaced the PRV valve' beats 'Fixed the plumbing.'

steps.title: Send via text or email
steps.description: Deliver the summary with photos attached.
substeps: Text is fine for small jobs — attach 2-3 photos
Email works better for larger jobs with more details
Include your invoice or payment link if not paid yet
Send within an hour of finishing

steps.title: Follow up with a review request
steps.description: The completion summary sets up a natural review ask.
substeps: Wait 1-2 hours after sending the summary
Send: 'Glad we could help! If you're happy with the work, a Google review would really help us out: [your review link]'
Or include the review ask in the summary itself

successMessage: You sent a professional job summary! Customers appreciate the communication and are primed to leave a review.
proTips: Completion summaries reduce disputes — you have documented proof of what was done
Recommendations in the summary plant seeds for future work
Save your best summaries as templates for similar jobs
